import sys

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x_lst = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    x_lst.sort()

    if x in x_lst:
        x_lst.remove(x)

    min_d = max(x_lst[0] - x, x - x_lst[-1])
    for i in range(1, n):
        min_d = max(min_d, (x_lst[i] - x_lst[i - 1]) // 2)

    print(min_d)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x_lst = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    x_lst.sort()

    if x in x_lst:
        x_lst.remove(x)

    min_d = max(x_lst[0] - x, x - x_lst[-1])
    for i in range(1, n):
        min_d = max(min_d, (x_lst[i] - x_lst[i - 1]) // 2)

    print(min_d)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n, x = map(int, input().split())
cities = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Find the minimum distance between the starting point and the cities
min_dist = min([abs(x - city) for city in cities])

# Find the maximum distance between the cities
max_dist = max([abs(city1 - city2) for city1 in cities for city2 in cities])

# Find the maximum distance that can be traveled
print(max(min_dist, max_dist // 2))
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
Created on Thu Apr  9 13:39:18 2020
@author: abhijithneilabraham
"""

n, x = map(int, input().split())
cities = list(map(int, input().split()))
# Find the minimum distance between the starting point and the cities
min_dist = min([abs(x - city) for city in cities])
# Find the maximum distance between the cities
max_dist = max([abs(city1 - city2) for city1 in cities for city2 in cities])
# Find the maximum distance that can be traveled
print(max(min_dist, max_dist // 2))
import sys

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x_lst = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    x_lst.sort()

    if x in x_lst:
        x_lst.remove(x)

    min_d = max(x_lst[0] - x, x - x_lst[-1])
    for i in range(1, n):
        min_d = max(min_d, (x_lst[i] - x_lst[i - 1]) // 2)

    print(min_d)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
